org.mindswap.owls.process.execution
Class BaseProcessExecutionMonitor

java.lang.Object
  org.mindswap.owls.process.execution.BaseProcessExecutionMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, ProcessExecutionMonitor
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultProcessMonitor
public abstract class BaseProcessExecutionMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProcessExecutionMonitor

This class servers as the base implementation of process monitors. It merely provides methods to get and set the monitoring filter.

Method Detail

getMonitorFilter

public int getMonitorFilter()
Specified by:
getMonitorFilter in interface ProcessExecutionMonitor

setMonitorFilter

public void setMonitorFilter(int processType)
Description copied from interface: ProcessExecutionMonitor
Control if executionStarted and executionFinished will be called for all the processes or only for a specific type of processes. The constant values are defined in Process interface:
  • Process.ANY
  • Process.ATOMIC
  • Process.COMPOSITE
  • Process.SIMPLE
Bitwise combinations (bitwise or) of these values are also valid.

Specified by:
setMonitorFilter in interface ProcessExecutionMonitor
Parameters:
processType - Integer number representing the filter bits.
